countries.name: Turkey
countries.description: Turkey is a transcontinental country located mainly on the Anatolian Peninsula in Western Asia, with a smaller portion on the Balkans in Southeast Europe.

countries.name: USA
countries.description: The United States of America (USA), commonly known as the United States (U.S. or US), is a country primarily located in North America.
